items.name: restrict_type
items.title: Apply Restrictions On
items.tooltip: This determines restrictions rule to be applied on selected category or all categories of the event

items.name: restrict_in_category
items.title: Select Event Categories
items.tooltip: Set the restrictions based on the selected event's categories

items.name: total_submisssion
items.title: Total Events
items.tooltip:
Set the total number of events a user is allowed to create in EasySocial.

When restriction applied on 'specific event categories', the number of events allowed is applied to each categories.

items.name: statusPublished
items.title: Publish Events When Subscription:
items.tooltip: Determine when should system publish the user's created events that associated with the above selected event's categories based on user's subscription status.

items.name: statusUnpublished
items.title: UnPublish Events When Subscription:
items.tooltip: Determine when should system unpublish the user's created events that associated with the above selected event's categories based on user's subscription status.
